bug.short_desc: Improve documentation of the model property

long_desc.thetext:
The model selection fails to handle sets of items having a) not all models set b) equal models set.
As printing out a warning on setting the model on the list item is a hard task because the list item has no information in what widget it is used. Improving the documentation is the first step to get that problem addressed because the current documentation does not mention a thing about these restrictions.

Added the following to the model property documentation:
Be careful using that property as this is used for the qx.ui.form.MModelSelection it has some restrictions: * Donâ€™t use equal models in one widget using the qx.ui.form.MModelSelection. * Avoid setting only some model properties if the widgets are added to a qx.ui.form.MModelSelection widge. Both restrictions result of the fact, that the set models are deputies for their widget.
